name: LawnCare Madness
description:
REQUIRES GAMEPAD

This may or may not run and it does require you to plug in an xbox controller.

Directions:

Open the first folder (LawnCare Madness) - > then click on windowsGame1 folder, click on the second windowsGame1 folder, then click on the 3rd windowsGame1 folder (3 of these total), then click the bin folder, then x86 folder, then debug folder,

then windowsGame1 application (the one with the xbox controller next to it) and it should run

let me know if this works.

Hambone
